title: As annoying as Leona hitting like a Mack truck is.....
body:
It's still 1000 times better than the Enchanter support meta of hiding in the back spamming 3k worth of heals and shields while point and click hard CCing anything that attempts to get to the backline. 

Aggressive play-making supports like Leona, Ali, Braum, etc feel so much better to play with and against than Soraka, Lulu, Janna, etc.

So as much as we bitch about what's strong right now, thank you Riot for shifting the meta. Leona being a bit overtuned still feels 100 times better than when Janna was overtuned.

Lulu's polymorph is one of the few point and click hard CC ability amongst the enchanter supports, and it has a travel time and allows the enemy to still move. Unless you want to count her ult as well, and that can only be used on allies and doesn't knock up enemies unless they're in range. Her E being the shield and on-hit modifier and her ult being a sort of heal.
Sona's only targeted CC is her empowered E auto, and I suppose her empowered W auto if you want to add that as well. Her ult is a skillshot. Her W is her heal and shield 2-in-1, with both values being incredibly low at rank 1 but gaining effectiveness as you level up since the cooldown goes down by a large margin.
Janna has a targeted slow (which is annoying in any situation given how fast she can be), and then her Q which is a knockup gaining range and speed the longer you hold it, with the knock up duration having a max of 1.25 seconds. Her E being her shield and her ult being a heal per second with a knock-back on activation.
Then Soraka has her silence, which can be categorized as a skillshot, which also has a delayed root if you stay in the circle. Obviously her heals being W and R, with her W costing her own health.
Bard has a stun only if he hits two enemies or an enemy and a wall, and then his ult. His heal gains more effectiveness if it charges for the full 10 seconds.
Karma has a delayed root, probably the only point and click hard CC ability of the group that stops movement. It's reliability goes up when she speeds herself up and uses her empowered Q. Of course, her shield is her E which can also be empowered to shield everyone with the main target getting more shielding.
Similar case with Rakan, where his W's reliability increases when used in combination with his ult. Even then, that's his combo, and he can't CC you again until his W comes off cooldown, which then depends on if the enemies don't move fast enough to get out of the circle, or they flash away. His E is a short dash and his Q heal depends on you hitting a champion or epic monster.
I suppose you can also throw Zilean in here, and since his targeted slow at max rank is 99% for 2.5 seconds, which can also be refreshed with his W, and then giving him easy access to land his bomb stun for 1.5 seconds. His only heal is his ult, and that's situational where his targeted ally needs to fall in combat.

So for the future, don't go around complaining about enchanter supports having point and click hard CC with shields/heals, because that's not true.
